explains: n. 母亲身份，母性；母亲们（总称）

sentences.en: Who could argue against motherhood and apple pie ?
sentences.cn: 谁会反对母性与家庭的温馨呢？

sentences.en: Introduction of the republican motherhood thesis dramatically changed historiography.
sentences.cn: 共和党母性理论的引入戏剧性地改变了史学。

sentences.en: According to Kerber, motherhood became pivotal to the fate of the republic, providing justification for an unprecedented attention to female education.
sentences.cn: 根据 Kerber 的说法，母性成为了共和国命运的关键，这为前所未有的女性教育关注提供了辩护。
